title: NIPER Kolkata Recruitment 2026 - Apply for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: National Institute of Pharmaceutical Education and Research (NIPER Kolkata) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech., M.Pharm can use this opportunity and apply for the NIPER Kolkata Recruitment 2026 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. If you are looking for mor...
